title: Bob Chapek's Toughest Test Yet: Disney's “Worst Week” Over 'Don't' Say Gay' Response Could Lead To “Profound Change” - Deadline

description: It’s been a rough first two years for Bob Chapek in Disney’s top job. First came the pandemic, which started just days into Chapek’s tenure as CEO, bringing the entertainment indu…
